Various organic substances decompose at the bottom of the pond. Rot can develop from these deposits. If this sediment is not removed, water quality will be seriously affected. As soon as sediment builds up, get rid of it with the high-performance HEISSNER F638P-00 vacuum cleaner so that all pond inhabitants can breathe again.
